name: Mastek
description: Mastek is an enterprise digital & cloud transformation specialist that engineers excellence for customers across 40 countries, including the UK, Europe, US, Middle East, Asia Pacific and India. We help enterprises navigate the digital landscape and stay competitive by unlocking the power of data, modernising applications and accelerating digital advantage for our customers. Mastek's mission is to Decomplex Digital with Trust, Value and Velocity and make our clients’ business future-ready with an industry-first approach. Aligned to this vision, Evosys, a Mastek company, has partnered with 1500+ customers globally in their Oracle Cloud transformation journey
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Trust Value Velocity
ShortDescription: Mastek is a global Turnkey Digital Engineering & Cloud Transformation specialist delivering innovative solutions and business outcomes for its clients for more than 40 years.

Highlights.name: Government
Highlights.description: Mastek’s public sector and government consulting services leverages the power of tommorow’s technologies and helps you solve the challenges of a changing world.

Highlights.name: Healthcare
Highlights.description: Mastek’s reimagines your technology choice and helps you build an agile intelligent, high-performing healthcare system that drives  long-term results.

Highlights.name: Retail
Highlights.description: Mastek’s agile digital retail technologies automate business to business processes, drive efficiencies and are transforming customer experience.

enhanced_description: Mastek is a global enterprise digital & cloud transformation specialist with over 40 years of experience, engineering excellence for customers across 40 countries. They help enterprises navigate the digital landscape, unlock the power of data, modernize applications, and accelerate digital advantage. Mastek's mission is to 'Decomplex Digital with Trust, Value and Velocity' and make businesses future-ready through an industry-first approach. Evosys, a Mastek company, has partnered with over 1500 customers globally in their Oracle Cloud transformation journey, providing turnkey digital engineering and cloud transformation solutions.
key_use_cases: Solving public sector and government challenges
Building agile, intelligent, high-performing healthcare systems
Driving efficiencies and transforming customer experience in retail
competitive_advantages: Over 40 years of experience in digital engineering and cloud transformation
Specialization in enterprise digital & cloud transformation
Extensive partnership with 1500+ customers globally in Oracle Cloud transformation
Mission to 'Decomplex Digital with Trust, Value and Velocity'
